title: [REQUEST] Riot, URF on ANZAC Day
body: Never played this mode before but seems like fun. Please put URF on ANZAC day (Monday) too since it's a long weekend. I think many would appreciate it.

replies.body: yeah good idea, however Anzac isn't a celebration day more of a rememberance day... since URF is extremely fun I'm not sure if it would be suited on that day...
Pretty sure every time they have ever released urf they have extended it so you will probably get your wish
